scripts.dev: npm run clean && parcel watch blocks/**/*.scss blocks/**/*.js assets/js/*.js assets/scss/main-styles.scss assets/scss/editor-styles.scss assets/images/* --no-source-maps
scripts.build: npm run clean && parcel build blocks/**/*.scss blocks/**/*.js assets/js/*.js assets/scss/main-styles.scss assets/scss/editor-styles.scss assets/images/* --no-source-maps
